TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class CaptureRequest : Android.Hardware.Camera2.CameraMetadata, Android.OS.IParcelable, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CaptureRequest extends Android.Hardware.Camera2.CameraMetadata implements class Android.OS.IParcelable, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class CaptureRequest Inherits CameraMetadata Implements IDisposable, IJavaPeerable, IParcelable
public ref class CaptureRequest sealed : Android::Hardware::Camera2::CameraMetadata, Android::OS::IParcelable, IDisposable, Java::Interop::IJavaPeerable
type CaptureRequest = class inherit CameraMetadata interface IParcelable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: An immutable package of settings and outputs needed to capture a single image from the camera device.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property BlackLevelLock As CaptureRequest.Key

Docs.summary: Whether black-level compensation is locked to its current values, or is free to vary.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ColorCorrectionAberrationMode As CaptureRequest.Key

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ColorCorrectionGains As CaptureRequest.Key

Docs.summary: Gains applying to Bayer raw color channels for white-balance.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ColorCorrectionMode As CaptureRequest.Key

Docs.summary: The mode control selects how the image data is converted from the sensor's native color into linear sRGB color.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ColorCorrectionTransform As CaptureRequest.Key

Docs.summary: A color transform matrix to use to transform from sensor RGB color space to output linear sRGB color space.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ControlAeAntibandingMode As CaptureRequest.Key

Docs.summary: The desired setting for the camera device's auto-exposure algorithm's antibanding compensation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ControlAeExposureCompensation As CaptureRequest.Key

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ControlAeLock As CaptureRequest.Key

Docs.summary: Whether auto-exposure (AE) is currently locked to its latest calculated values.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ControlAeMode As CaptureRequest.Key

Docs.summary: The desired mode for the camera device's auto-exposure routine.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ControlAePrecaptureTrigger As CaptureRequest.Key

Docs.summary: Whether the camera device will trigger a precapture metering sequence when it processes this request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ControlAeRegions As CaptureRequest.Key

Docs.summary: List of metering areas to use for auto-exposure adjustment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ControlAeTargetFpsRange As CaptureRequest.Key

Docs.summary: Range over which the auto-exposure routine can adjust the capture frame rate to maintain good exposure.

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteToParcel (Android.OS.Parcel? dest, Android.OS.ParcelableWriteFlags flags);

abstract member WriteToParcel : Android.OS.Parcel * Android.OS.ParcelableWriteFlags -> unit override this.WriteToParcel : Android.OS.Parcel * Android.OS.ParcelableWriteFlags -> unit

Additional flags about how the object should be written. May be 0 or .
